product_name: The North Face Shavasana 3/4 Leggings - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: A slimming pair of moisture-wicking, quick-drying yoga leggings, The North Face Shavasana 3/4 Leggings for women offer highly supportive fabric that won't wrinkle, shrink or fade over time. Contoured mid-rise waistband is higher in the back and dips in the front to eliminate the potential for muffin top. Shaped waistband allows you to bend forward comfortably without fabric digging into your abs. Cropped length and seamed construction on the thighs and calves show off your well-honed technique. Tuck a studio pass or cash into the hidden key pocket for safekeeping. Closeout.
short_description: A slimming pair of moisture-wicking, quick-drying yoga leggings, The North Face Shavasana 3/4 Leggings for women offer highly supportive fabric that won't wrinkle, shrink or fade over time.
